title: Community Tournaments
body:
Hello, Summoners! 

My name is Loststardust and currently, run the community events for summoners' Society facebook group. We are running fortnightly tournaments. We would like to keep running them, as its amazing to see the community grow! Also with OOL only a few months away it gives really good practice for new teams that just formed! 

Our next tournament is this weekend! :https://www.facebook.com/events/356074774724958/

We would like to keep the tournaments running every fortnight but we need to keep having 8 teams sign up regularly. Each tournament has riot prizing (1st-8th place all receive prizing)

All future events will be shared in the facebook group, so feel free to join. (If your facebook profile doesn't have much information on it, just shot a personal message to one of the admins and ask them to say yes to request!)
 
At this stage, we have no found a way to help players form teams without it becoming messy and too hard to manage. If anyone has any ideas please feel free to suggest away! We love to find a way to involve everyone. Though feel free to ask in the group or use the 'Looking for a team picture' in the pinned post of the facebook group. 

Thank you for reading, 

Jinx out! 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: cool what you're doing here! Sadly, i cannot do it as I don't have enough friends irl to play with (and i have trust issues with people i dont know) sounds cool, once my other friend get LoL we might try it when he hits level 30

I understand, it can be hard playing with strangers. I really hope you find some people that you can trust and play with soon. Hope to see you around LevvyLeviticus! 

~loststardust
